content: Yes, that was definitely an intense and action-packed scene! The use of practical effects and CGI during that sequence made it feel very real and visceral, which is one of the strengths of the show's visual effects. The Demodogs are basically a more aggressive, animalistic version of the Demogorgon, and they presented a unique challenge to the visual effects team. However, they were able to pull it off and create a terrifying, believable creature that added to the show's suspense and horror elements.
